short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the floating emoji reactions on the Kaltura video streaming platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If the floating emoji reactions on Kaltura are distracting for you, you can hide them by installing this extension.  Note that it also prevents you from _sending_ reactions.
